content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here the crafty carrying case is a great way to keep your most important tools handy and take your crochet wherever you go one of the great things about crocheting is its portability - but more often than not you need more than just yarn and a hook i m always digging through my bag for my needles tape measure and scissors - and too often getting a sharp poke for my trouble a few years ago i designed a small needle case and that was good for the needles and the tiniest of scissors but i got a lot of feedback from crocheters looking for something larger with more storage options such as a larger pocket for scissors so here is the result - the crafty carrying case video tutorial in right and left-handed included
